alert.note: Alert for Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 7:45PM CDT until September 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana... Central St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grand Prairie, or 7 miles east of Ville Platte, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Ville Platte, Washington, Grand Prairie, and Prairie Ronde. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
